channel.title: Invalid Number of Parameters in Script!
channel.description:
Hey guys, im new at this and trying to figure it all out But whenever I try to run this script, i get this error:
Failed when compiling Line 100: [Error] (2745:1): Invalid number of parameters in script
I go to line 100, and heres whats there. Maybe some one can figure out whats wrong?
[code]procedure Randoms; begin if(FishEquip)then begin repeat if(FishMode=1)then PickUpObject('Take Lobster pot',607847) if(FishMode=2)or(FishMode=3)then <------Line 100! PickUpObject('Take Harpoon',942722) Trys:=Trys+1; until(Look=Trys) if(Look=Trys)then ToBank; end;[/code]

item.title: Invalid Number of Parameters in Script!
item.dc:creator: @Cheesehunk Cheesehunk
item.description:
@Cheesehunk wrote:

What include are you using? Because I don’t know what the procedure is, and what it is a part of.

Read full topic
item.source: Invalid Number of Parameters in Script!
